statements: SELECT * FROM absentee_and_early_voting;
SELECT voter_name, request_date FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE submission_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM absentee_and_early_voting ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE submission_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE voter_name LIKE 'John%' AND submission_date < '2022-10-23';
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, request_date, submission_date FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE request_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT voter_name, submission_date FROM absentee_and_early_voting WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM absentee_and_early_voting GROUP BY voter_name HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM absentee_and_early_voting ORDER BY request_date ASC, submission_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM absentee_requests;
SELECT request_id, voter_id, status FROM absentee_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT submission_id, voter_id, submission_date FROM voting_submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_submissions WHERE voter_id = 1001 AND submission_status = 'approved';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_submissions FROM voting_submissions;
SELECT * FROM absentee_requests WHERE voter_id = 100 ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(request_id) AS request_count FROM absentee_requests GROUP BY voter_id HAVING COUNT(request_id) > 1;
SELECT submission_date, COUNT(submission_id) AS submission_count FROM voting_submissions WHERE submission_type = 'mail' GROUP BY submission_date;
SELECT voter_id, request_date, submission_date FROM absentee_requests LEFT JOIN voting_submissions ON absentee_requests.voter_id = voting_submissions.voter_id;
SELECT voter_id, submission_date FROM voting_submissions WHERE submission_status = 'approved' ORDER BY submission_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeRequests;
SELECT request_id, voter_name, request_date FROM AbsenteeRequests;
SELECT request_id, voter_name FROM AbsenteeRequests ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeRequests WHERE voter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT voter_name, request_date FROM AbsenteeRequests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeRequests WHERE voter_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT voter_name, request_date FROM AbsenteeRequests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' AND request_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeRequests INNER JOIN AbsenteeSubmissions ON AbsenteeRequests.request_id = AbsenteeSubmissions.request_id WHERE AbsenteeSubmissions.submission_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT voter_name FROM AbsenteeRequests ORDER BY voter_name;
SELECT voter_name, COUNT(request_id) AS request_count FROM AbsenteeRequests GROUP BY voter_name HAVING request_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeVotingRequest ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, request_status FROM EarlyVotingRequest WHERE request_status='Pending';
SELECT submission_id, submission_date FROM AbsenteeVotingSubmission WHERE submission_status='Approved';
SELECT * FROM EarlyVotingSubmission ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT request_id, voter_id, request_date, request_status FROM AbsenteeVotingRequest WHERE voter_id=123;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeVotingRequest;
SELECT request_id, voter_id, request_date FROM EarlyVotingRequest ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT request_id, submission_date, submission_status FROM AbsenteeVotingSubmission WHERE submission_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM EarlyVotingSubmission WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests, request_status FROM AbsenteeVotingRequest GROUP BY request_status ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeVotingRequests;
SELECT voter_id, request_date FROM AbsenteeVotingSubmissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, request_reason FROM EarlyVotingRequests WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, location FROM EarlyVotingSubmissions WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT voting_date, voting_type FROM VotingRecords WHERE voting_type = 'In-person' ORDER BY voting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AbsenteeVotingRequests WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT voter_id, submission_date, location FROM EarlyVotingSubmissions WHERE voting_type = 'In-Person' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, request_date, location FROM EarlyVotingRequests WHERE location IN ('City Hall', 'Community Center');
SELECT voter_id, submission_date FROM AbsenteeVotingSubmissions WHERE submission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT voter_id, request_reason FROM AbsenteeVotingRequests WHERE LENGTH(request_reason) > 50 ORDER BY voter_id ASC;
